roleset.name: fluster, cause to be nervous
roleset.note: DISCOMPOSE-V NOTES: Framed by Claire. (from discompose.01-v)

role.descr: Manner or instrument if separate from arg 0

example.name: Discomposed Ladies
example.text: He saw the breasts heave, and the flowers shake with the heaving, and marveled what should so much discompose the girl.
